ImageFunction

　The ImageFunction class is a class that operates on images.
　Objects cannot be created from this class.

メンバ

コンストラクタ
なし
メソッド
adjustGamma ( Gamma correction )
colorRect ( Rectangular translucent fill )
doBoxBlur ( Apply a rectangular blur )
doGrayScale ( Grayscale conversion )
drawGlyph ( Character drawing )
drawText ( Character drawing )
fillRect ( Rectangle fill )
flipLR ( Flip horizontal )
flipUD ( flip upside down )
operateAffine ( Affine transform arithmetic synthesis )
operateRect ( Rectangle operation composition )
operateStretch ( Scaling operation synthesis )
プロパティ
なし
イベント
なし
